```{r}
install.packages("gganimate")
install.packages("gifski")  # GIF formatına dönüştürmek için
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)

# Örnek veri
time_data <- data.frame(
  time = rep(1:10, each = 2),
  value = c(1,2, 2,4, 3,6, 4,8, 5,10, 6,12, 7,14, 8,16, 9,18, 10,20)
)

# Animasyonlu çizgi grafiği
p <- ggplot(time_data, aes(x = time, y = value)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.5, color = "red") +
  transition_reveal(time) +
  labs(title = "Time Series Animation", x = "Time", y = "Value")

# Kaydet
anim_save("line_animation.gif", animate(p))

```
